title: vina naasakoni
sahitya:
vina nAshakoni unnAnurA vishva rUpuDa nE

anupallavi

 manasAraga vInula vindugA madhuramaina palukula

caraNam

 sItA ramaNitO O mana guNTa lADi gElucuTa nokari kokaru jUci A bhAvamerigi sAkEtAdhpia 
nijamagu prEmatO balku konna nuccaTa vAtAtmaja bharatulu vinnatula tyAgarAjanuta sannuta
